title: Joint General Secretary and Assistant Village Education Program Coordinator, NSS - BIT Mesra
description: Co-Leading a team of 10+ members, created a platform for the free education of the underprivileged children of the villages adopted by NSS BIT Mesra. Organised and participated in various Blood donation camps, orphanage visits, Chesire home visits, health camps, conducted various surveys and awareness drives.

title: RESOURCE CORE (Team Lead)
description: Co-lead the Resource Team of Pantheon 2018- annual tech fest of our college.
